general information: Marketing Information The 20" VS208N-P monitor has a LED-backlit panel capable of vivid Full 1080p high-definition while also saving more energy than traditional CCFL monitors. Also, it is Energy Star certified and is EPEAT gold rated-one of the highest green standards in the industry. The VS208N-P features a built-in wall charger into a slim chassis for added space-saving convenience. VESA-mount ready, it securely adheres to walls. As the first monitor of the VS series to enter our renowned Corporate Stable Model program, the VS208N-P is guaranteed to remain in stable supply for a minimum of 1 year. This ensures guaranteed replacement should you need more of the same models, along with quick advanced swap program ASUS Rapid Replacement.
